title: Version 2.1.0 - Jelly Physics Overhaul
description: Complete rewrite of the jelly physics engine for smoother, more realistic movement.
details: Improved collision detection with better bounce mechanics
New color-shifting system with 12 unique transformations
Enhanced mobile controls with haptic feedback
Added 5 new levels with unique mechanics

title: Bug Fixes & Performance
description: Squashed several bugs and improved overall game stability.
details: Resolved audio sync issues on Android
Fixed visual glitch with jelly stretching

title: New Power-ups Added
description: Introducing exciting new power-ups to enhance your jelly adventure.
details: Time Warp: Temporarily slows down obstacles
Jelly Clone: Creates a temporary duplicate
Rainbow Trail: Leaves colorful path for bonus points
Gravity Flip: Inverts gravity for unique gameplay

title: Level Editor Beta
description: Create your own jelly adventures with our new level editor.
details: Drag-and-drop interface for easy level creation
Rate and comment on other players' levels
